name: Resident Evil: The Server Room
description:
HOW TO PLAY IT:

FOR EACH ZOMBIE COLOR, IT HAS AN SPECIFIC ATTACK

_IF IT IS BLACK, YOU USE KICKS (RIGHT-CLICK),  GREEN  USE STAB ATTACK (PRESS KEY "F") AND FOR RED COLOR SHOOT THEM (LEFT-CLICK).

_NEMESIS CHANGES HIS COLOR RANDOMLY.

_WHEN YOU'RE LIFE BAR, GUN'S BAR STATE IS LOW, YOU HAVE TO GO BACK TO THE SAFE ROOM IN ORDER TO GET ALL REPAIRED.

_IF YOU MISS THE ATTACK WITH THE WRONG COLOR YOU WILL GET DAMAGED INSTEAD.

_GET EXTRA LIFE BY KICKING THE BLACK ZOMBIE. (IT DOESN'T WORK WITH NEMESIS)

_GET EXTRA BULLETS BY SHOOTING THE RED ZOMBIES AT THE CORNERS. (IT DOESN'T WORK WITH NEMESIS)

_GET YOUR GUN STATE BAR REPAIRED BY STAB THE GREEN ZOMBIES. (IT DOESN'T WORK WITH NEMESIS)

NEMESIS GET EXTRA LIFE WHEN YOU MISS THE COLOR  SCHEME ATTACK.
